modName: DW420 - Coloured Map Markers and Compass Icons
summary: Add Colour To Your Map Markers and Compass Icons
descriptionHtml:
The aim of this mod is to add coloured markers without cluttering the screen with too much colour

For this reason locations where separated into loose groups and have had their "discovered" colours changed appropriately :

White - Towers,Shipwrecks,Points of interest etc
Light green - Caves, Groves and Clearings etc
Light red - Altars,Ruins and Temples etc
Light yellow - Farms,Mills,Stables,Towns etc
Deeper (but still light) yellow - Capital Strongholds [Dragonsreach etc]
Even deeper yellow (Ecru) - Discovered Capitals [Whiterun etc]
Dark Petrol - Undiscovered Capitals [colours were also inverted like all other icons]
Light Blue - Stormcloak camps
Brown - Imperial camps
Dark Red - Dragon Lairs
Purple - Player Home [Only if using Voleks [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2723]"Player Home Map Markers"[/url] v0.4 or later]

*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete map.swf from /Data/Interface & hudmenu.gfx from /Data/Interface/Exported

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is allowed when proper credit is provided
*****************************************************************************
